titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford Athletic Board Minutes SC0978
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-10-26 11:16:52 -0700.

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.abstract: Included in this collection are the minutes of the Stanford Athletic Council which functioned between 1946 and 1950. Typical matters addressed include sale of Big Game tickets, contracts with other colleges, training regulations, upkeep of facilities, televising games, the golf course, and finances. Other subjects include the Buck of the Month Club, staff appointments, the Stanford Riding School, involvement of Stanford athletes in Olympic Games, and non-varsity sports.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford Athletic Board Minutes (SC0978). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Stanford Board of Athletic Control was re-established by the Board of Trustees in 1950, newly named the Stanford Athletic Board. Their responsibilities included care of athletic facilities, oversight of competitive sports events, and budgetary matters.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Included in this collection are the minutes of the Stanford Athletic Council which functioned between 1946 and 1950. Typical matters addressed include sale of Big Game tickets, contracts with other colleges, training regulations, upkeep of facilities, televising games, the golf course, and finances. Other subjects include the Buck of the Month Club, staff appointments, the Stanford Riding School, involvement of Stanford athletes in Olympic Games, and non-varsity sports.
